name: Pesach 2020 - Revenge of the Plagues!
description:
In celebration of Pesach (Passover, April 8) I made a 3D game: “Pesach 2020 Revenge of the Plagues”!

It’s a simple game, applying the skills I learned in my Unity Create with Code Live course.

There’s lots of room for improvement, and I’m looking forward to learning more skills and creating more projects in the future.

In the game, you’re Moses at the Nile River and you have to collect as many frogs as possible before time runs out!

The Arrow keys move you around and if you need to exit the game, just close the window (ex. ALT + F4).

In the future, I’d like to add an EXIT control and a cleaner GAME OVER mode that shows the total frogs counted and an option to PLAY AGAIN to make it easier to play.

Have fun racing to collect the frogs before time runs out and make sure you have your volume on for some fun accompanying music.

Thanks for playing my game!!
